refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis:
#include <libgnomeui/libgnomeui.h>
#define GNOME_PAD #define GNOME_PAD_SMALL #define GNOME_PAD_BIG #define GNOME_YES #define GNOME_NO #define GNOME_OK #define GNOME_CANCEL #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_QUIT #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_QUIT #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_EXIT #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_EXIT #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_CLOSE #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_CLOSE #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_CUT #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_CUT #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_COPY #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_COPY #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_PASTE #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_PASTE #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_SELECT_ALL #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_SELECT_ALL #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_CLEAR #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_CLEAR #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_UNDO #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_UNDO #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_REDO #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_REDO #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_SAVE #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_SAVE #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_OPEN #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_OPEN #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_SAVE_AS #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_SAVE_AS #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_NEW #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_NEW #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_PRINT #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_PRINT #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_PRINT_SETUP #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_PRINT_SETUP #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_FIND #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_FIND #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_FIND_AGAIN #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_FIND_AGAIN #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_REPLACE #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_REPLACE #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_NEW_WINDOW #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_NEW_WINDOW #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_CLOSE_WINDOW #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_CLOSE_WINDOW #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_REDO_MOVE #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_REDO_MOVE #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_UNDO_MOVE #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_UNDO_MOVE #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_PAUSE_GAME #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_PAUSE_GAME #define GNOME_KEY_NAME_NEW_GAME #define GNOME_KEY_MOD_NEW_GAME

refsect2.title: GNOME_PAD
refsect2.para: A sensible amount of padding (in pixels) to put around objects.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PAD_SMALL
refsect2.para: A smaller amount of padding than GNOME_PAD.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PAD_BIG
refsect2.para: A larger amount of padding then GNOME_PAD.

refsect2.title: GNOME_YES

warning.para: GNOME_YES is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Old way to specify the "yes" button in a yes-no dialog box. New code should use the constants in GTK+ to do this now.

refsect2.title: GNOME_NO

warning.para: GNOME_NO is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Old way to specify the "no" button in a yes-no dialog box. New code should use the constants in GTK+ to do this now.

refsect2.title: GNOME_OK

warning.para: GNOME_OK is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Old way to specify the "ok" button in a ok-cancel dialog box. New code should use the constants in GTK+ to do this now.

refsect2.title: GNOME_CANCEL

warning.para: GNOME_CANCEL is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Old way to specify the "cancel" button in a ok-cancel dialog box. New code should use the constants in GTK+ to do this now.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_QUIT
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the quit menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_QUIT
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_QUIT to select the quit menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_EXIT

warning.para: GNOME_KEY_NAME_EXIT is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: The default key used to select the exit menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_EXIT

warning.para: GNOME_KEY_MOD_EXIT is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_EXIT to select the exit menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_CLOSE
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the close menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_CLOSE
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_CLOSE to select the close menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_CUT
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the cut menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_CUT
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_CUT to select the cut menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_COPY
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the copy menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_COPY
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_COPY to select the copy menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_PASTE
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the paste menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_PASTE
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_PASTE to select the paste menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_SELECT_ALL
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the select all menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_SELECT_ALL
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_SELECT_ALL to select the select all menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_CLEAR
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the clear menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_CLEAR
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_CLEAR to select the clear menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_UNDO
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the undo menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_UNDO
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_UNDO to select the undo menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_REDO
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the redo menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_REDO
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_REDO to select the redo menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_SAVE
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the save menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_SAVE
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_SAVE to select the save menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_OPEN
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the open menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_OPEN
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_OPEN to select the open menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_SAVE_AS
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the save as menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_SAVE_AS
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_SAVE_AS to select the save as menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_NEW
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the new menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_NEW
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_NEW to select the new menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_PRINT
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the print menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_PRINT
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_PRINT to select the print menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_PRINT_SETUP
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the print setup menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_PRINT_SETUP
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_PRINT_SETUP to select the print setup menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_FIND
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the find menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_FIND
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_FIND to select the find menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_FIND_AGAIN
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the find again menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_FIND_AGAIN
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_FIND_AGAIN to select the find again menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_REPLACE
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the replace menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_REPLACE
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_REPLACE to select the replace menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_NEW_WINDOW
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the new window menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_NEW_WINDOW
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_NEW_WINDOW to select the new window menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_CLOSE_WINDOW
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the close window menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_CLOSE_WINDOW
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_CLOSE_WINDOW to select the close window menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_REDO_MOVE
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the redo move menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_REDO_MOVE
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_REDO_MOVE to select the redo move menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_UNDO_MOVE
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the undo move menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_UNDO_MOVE
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_UNDO_MOVE to select the undo move menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_PAUSE_GAME
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the pause game menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_PAUSE_GAME
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_PAUSE_GAME to select the pause game menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_NAME_NEW_GAME
refsect2.para: The default key used to select the new game menu item.

refsect2.title: GNOME_KEY_MOD_NEW_GAME
refsect2.para: The default modifier used in conjunction with GNOME_KEY_NAME_NEW_GAME to select the new game menu item.
